title: Rescue Bay
description: Rescue Bay follows a team of lifeguards who patrol the beaches, save lives, and run in slow motion.
altHero: a hunky male lifeguard runs along the beach
alt1: beach patrons watch a beautiful female lifeguard walk by
alt2: another beautiful lifeguard runs on the beach
alt3: a beach patrolman by a Jeep
alt4: a male lifeguard stands on the edge of a speed boat as a fire burns in the foreground
